issue.title: [Bug Report] Multiple call stack exceeded messages

repository.name: element
repository.description: A Vue.js 2.0 UI Toolkit for Web

issue.body:
<!-- generated by https://eleme-issue.surge.sh DO NOT REMOVE -->

### Element UI version
2.2.1

### OS/Browsers version
Ubuntu Linux 16.04

### Vue version
2.5.14

### Reproduction Link
[https://jsfiddle.net/mmx38qxw/542/](https://jsfiddle.net/mmx38qxw/542/)

### Steps to reproduce
In the browser console I'm getting lots of these errors:
```
vue.esm.js?65d7:591 [Vue warn]: Error in render: "RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded"

found in

---> <ElInput>
       <ElCascader>
         <ElFormItem>
           <ElCol>
             <ElForm>
               <ElCard>
                 <ElCol>
                   <ElRow>
                     <FinanceSettings> at /home/anthony/ownCloud/Projects/XolasUI/src/components/finance/FinanceSettings.vue
                       <App> at /home/anthony/ownCloud/Projects/XolasUI/src/App.vue
                         <Root>
warn @ vue.esm.js?65d7:591
logError @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1739
globalHandleError @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1734
handleError @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1723
Vue._render @ vue.esm.js?65d7:4542
updateComponent @ vue.esm.js?65d7:2790
...
flushSchedulerQueue @ vue.esm.js?65d7:2983
(anonymous) @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1839
flushCallbacks @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1760
vue.esm.js?65d7:1743 RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded
    at _traverse (vue.esm.js?65d7:1977)
...
    at _traverse (vue.esm.js?65d7:1992)
logError @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1743
globalHandleError @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1734
handleError @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1723
Vue._render @ vue.esm.js?65d7:4542
...
flushSchedulerQueue @ vue.esm.js?65d7:2983
(anonymous) @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1839
flushCallbacks @ vue.esm.js?65d7:1760
```

### What is Expected?
I upgraded from ui-elements **2.0.5** to the current release **2.21** and these errors appeared.

The previous version I was using was ui-elements 2.0.5 and **vue 2.4.2**. No changes at all to the code. Previously no issues at all.

I've deleted down completely my node_modules directory and reinstalled. Same issue.

I've tried using both npm install and yarn.

issue.title: Maximum call stack exceeded when using with custom components

repository.name: vue
repository.description: This is the repo for Vue 2. For Vue 3, go to https://github.com/vuejs/core

issue.body:
### Version
2.5.14

### Reproduction link
[https://jsfiddle.net/50wL7mdz/175425/](https://jsfiddle.net/50wL7mdz/175425/)

### Steps to reproduce
1. Including vue(v.2.5.14) and element.io styles and library.
2. Opening new form.
3. Opening new form element.
4. Using custom date picker element.

### What is expected?
It is expected to render a custom UI component for date picking.

### What is actually happening?
The element is not being render as the console is filled with errors.

[Vue warn]: Error in render: "RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded", vue.js:597
RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded, vue.js:1745



---
The issue is related to the latest vue.js version as it is working as expected with all up to 2.5.13.

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

body: 一不小心升级了下，同时升级了ele-ui。看到这个我就放心了

` } ```

issue.body:
Bumps [vue-server-renderer](https://github.com/vuejs/vue) from 2.5.14 to 2.5.16.
Release notes *Sourced from vue-server-renderer's [releases](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/releases).* > ## v2.5.16 > ### Bug Fixes > > * allow multiline expression in v-for 71b4b25, closes [#7792](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7792) > * fix keyName checking for arrow keys in IE11 4378fc5, closes [#7806](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7806) > * fix regression on duplicate component init when using shared data objects 984927a, closes [#7805](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7805) > * **core:** Make set/delete warning condition for undefined, null and ([#7818](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7818)) 9084747, closes [#7818](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7818) [#7452](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7452) > * **keep-alive:** run prune after render for correct active component check 215f877, closes [#7566](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7566) > * **model:** fix static input type being overwritten by v-bind object ([#7819](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7819)) a6169d1, closes [#7819](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7819) [#7811](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7811) > * **ssr:** fix SSR for async functional components 882e719, closes [#7784](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7784) > * **ssr:** fix v-show inline style rendering when style binding is array ([#7814](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7814)) 1a979c4, closes [#7814](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7814) [#7813](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7813) > * fix wrongly matched named slots in functional components 62a922e, closes [#7817](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7817) > * named slots for nested functional components 6dd73e9, closes [#7710](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7710) > > ## v2.5.15 > ### Bug Fixes > > * do not traverse VNodes when regsitering dependencies 84a9a9d, closes [#7786](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7786)
Commits - [`84a9a9d`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/84a9a9d61057f6f40a9ad2bee456b39ef0a8f001) fix: do not traverse VNodes when regsitering dependencies - [`bafc73f`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/bafc73f42705e277c1ae9390475fb455e5974fd6) build: build 2.5.15 - [`af5453c`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/af5453cd5e90461531f1711b5ecb6bd47136e7b0) build: release 2.5.15 - [`71b4b25`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/71b4b25375fa4bcd929e1161c35cab133e4a7c23) fix: allow multiline expression in v-for - [`666cdbd`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/666cdbd71e15de01e4b4468cb5b52ec882cae159) test(vdom): add test case for [#7786](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7786) ([#7793](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7793)) - [`882e719`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/882e7199fd8eee039291c4b9f7f324dcf46f32fd) fix(ssr): fix SSR for async functional components - [`35dc8c2`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/35dc8c2555da884bfb65451391887966bc411a98) types: add Fragment in RenderState typing ([#7802](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/7802)) - [`7020009`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/702000971c5a355c937607edb930b67311c78f5d) chore: fix typo - [`cf0b1b7`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/cf0b1b745f6b98f4e010f2e0b4c2351bb5a7b812) ci: use yarn.lock instead of package-lock.json - [`984927a`](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/commit/984927a1a98d10ad8af44f2accfb08d34d517610) fix: fix regression on duplicate component init when using shared data objects - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/vuejs/vue/compare/v2.5.14...v2.5.16)
